mapper.insert: INSERT into booking (b_num, b_due_date, to_num, m_id, b_date) VALUES (prj3.seq_bo.nextval, #{bookingDate}, #{tourNum}, #{m_id}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select to_name, thumb_img, to_char(b_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as b_due_date, b_num, b.r_num from booking b, tour t , member m where (m.m_id = b.m_id) and (t.to_num = b.to_num)
